name: Snakes in the Grass
description:
Snakes in the Grass is a first-person 3D detective game immersed in a neon/ vaporwave atmosphere.

This game is inspired by the myth of Medusa described in Ovid's "Metamorphoses".

The players finds themselves in a museum full of testimonies and history, in which they have to solve a hidden mystery through the discovery of clues and dialogue with its inhabitants.

In Snakes in the Grass the players can't take a right or wrong path, in this game there is only the ability to listen and decide what to believe.
This game uses myth to elevate the concept of victim blaming to a central theme, where judgment becomes  law and there is no way out.
